title: Petition: Allow Us to Invite Friends in the Practice Tool
body: It's fun and all to be able to add an A.I. into the practice tool, but I would really enjoy it if I could practice in the practice tool with friends.

Practice Tool wasn't made for this specific purpose.
Riot specifically stated that this is the case they wanted to avoid, where the Practice Tool will be used for practicing with friends or team vs team practice. It's meant for your own improvement only and you can't learn everything from it. The rest you have to get from actual games.
